Hi All,

People on this list might wish to contribute to Larry Garfield's
questions and wrestlings with making Drupal REST based.

  http://www.garfieldtech.com/blog/put-up-with-put

Would this be the first CMS that's truly REST?

-- 
All the best,

Berend de Boer
